Uses of Package
rt

Packages that use rt
rt Core classes and interfaces for an educational ray tracer. 
rt.cameras Implementations of the Camera interface. 
rt.films Implementations of the Film interface. 
rt.integrators Implementations of the Integrator interface. 
rt.intersectables Implementations of the Intersectable interface. 
rt.lightsources Implementations of the LightSource interface. 
rt.materials Implementations of the Material interface. 
rt.samplers Implementations of the Sampler interface. 
rt.scenes Implementations of the abstract class Scene. 
rt.tonemappers Implementations of the Tonemapper interface. 
 

Classes in rt used by rt
Camera
          Given the specification of a ray in image space, a camera constructs a corresponding ray in world space.
Film
          A film stores a 2D grid of Spectrum representing an image.
HitRecord
          Stores information about a ray-surface intersection.
Integrator
          An integrator takes a ray starting at the camera and evaluates its contribution to the image.
IntegratorFactory
          Makes an Integrator.
Intersectable
          An intersectable supports ray-surface intersection.
LightList
          A list of light sources.
LightSource.LightGeometry
           
Material
          Materials implement functionality for shading surfaces using their BRDFs.
Ray
          A ray represented by an origin and a direction.
Sampler
          Makes random samples, which are used for Monte Carlo rendering.
SamplerFactory
          Makes a Sampler.
Scene
          Defines scene properties that need to be made accessible to the renderer.
Spectrum
          Stores a spectrum of color values.
Tonemapper
          Compresses a raw rendered Film to an image that can be displayed on typical 8-bit displays.

          A ray represented by an origin and a direction.
